item.title: The Addams Family Ukulele Play Along - Key of Bb
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele. Key of Bb.
Chords Used: Bb, Cm, F. Finger picking/TAB included.
As heard on The Addams Family
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE & Bass): https://youtu.be/jy5lUe66E-k
******************** Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion.
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.
You are invited to visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (a free resource). Also on social media: Twitter (@UkeStuff) and Instagram (@ukestuff.info).
Want to make a donation towards this work? Visit https://www.paypal.me/ukestuff or https://www.buymeacoffee.com/ukestuff
Check out the "merch": https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Wiz Khalifa - See You Again - Universal Pictures Film Music - Key of Bb
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play See You Again on the ukulele by Wiz Khalifa and Charlie Puth. The chords used are Bb Eb F Cm Gm. In the Key of C https://youtu.be/uQ-EltSVFe4.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
▶ Check out my gear on Kit: https://kit.com/AndyRamos

item.title: Sam Cooke - A Change Is Gonna Come - Key of Bb
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play A Change Is Gonna Come on the ukulele by Sam Cooke. The chords used are Bb Cm7 Gm7 Eb C7 D7 F7.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Anne Janelle - Angels We Have Heard on High - Key of Bb
item.description:
For educational use. A new melody to the traditional Christmas Carol (and a new verse). Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of B-flat. Think it is an unfriendly key? I also transposed the song to C, making it far easier to play (https://youtu.be/gxAvBJza7iM).
As performed by Anne Janelle with James Hill. Anne Janelle is a singer and cello player, and is married to ukulele virtuoso and ukulele educator James Hill. Anne released this song this week--and released a handwritten chart of the chords of the song today, inviting people to play along. As it is Christmas Day, this will be the last Christmas/holiday play along that I create in 2018.
If you are new to the channel and/or ukulele, you can find all kinds of play along videos like these, which allow you to play along with the music you already know and love--sometimes modified to be in more ukulele friendly keys. There are also a number of great ukulele instructors on YouTube, including Cynthia Lin, Kate DeNure (One Music School), John Atkins (The Ukulele Teacher), Mike Lynch (who passed away in January of 2018, but his many videos are still out there to learn from), Stu Fuchs, Aldrine Guerrero (Ukulele Underground) and more.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Zedd - Happy Now - Key of Bb
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of B-flat, raised from the original key of A. Great for practicing the half-barre B-flat Chord.
As performed by Zedd, featuring Elley Duhé.
Many thanks to Katie Wardrobe from Midnight Music, www.midnightmusic.com.au, for the song suggestion.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Kesha - Praying - Key of Bb
item.description:
This video was created by the SUNY Fredonia Ukulele Club and is for educational purposes ONLY.
Thank you for 100+ subscribers!!!
Chords Used: Gm, F, Bb, Eb
All rights belong to Ben Abraham, Andrew Joslyn, Ryan Lewis and Kesha.
Check out our Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/fredoniaukuleleclub
Like our page on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/fredoniaukuleleclub/?ref=aymt_homepage_panel
Strum on!

item.title: Portugal. The Man - Feel It Still - Key of Bb
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Feel It Still by Portugal The Man on the ukulele. The chords used are Dm F Gm Bb. (1/2 step higher than original)
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Zoë Bestel - Mr Blue Sky - Key of Bb
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. In the original key of B-flat. Want to play along in an easier key? https://youtu.be/-YYdFWKENVo
As performed by Zoë Bestel. Please visit her original recording: https://youtu.be/031v-77x3gU
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Matt Maher - Lord, I Need You - Key of Bb
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Bb (original key) but requires a capo to work with the chords.
As performed by Matt Maher.
Need to practice at a different tempo? Use the gear icon in the video (lower right) to slow down (or speed up) the tempo at pitch! Need to do so on an iPad or iPhone? Check out the browser called "iCab Mobile" which has a Module called "Video Playback Rate"
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Matt Maher - Lord, I Need You - Key of Bb
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Requires the use of a capo. Key of Bb.
As performed by Matt Maher.
Uses a version of the song without (or with reduced) voices to encourage your own singing while still having a “backing track” available? Want a version with the voices?. Look for a similar song with “Ukulele Play Along.”
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd.
